name: BNNS.ConvolutionPadding
desc: Constants that describe convolution padding modes.

items.name: case asymmetric(left: Int, right: Int, up: Int, down: Int)
items.desc: A padding mode that supports individual padding values for each side.

items.name: case symmetric(x: Int, y: Int)
items.desc: A padding mode that provides symmetric padding.

items.name: static var zero: BNNS.ConvolutionPadding
items.desc: A padding mode with zero padding on all sides.
